title: 350 West 4th - Unit 103
posting_body: ['Available September 1st.', 'Sunny loft-like one bedroom with high ceilings and large windows in the former Bigelow School with PARKING!', 'Enter into a good sized living room/dining room with engineered wood floors, nice kitchen with stainless steel appliances, maple cabinets, dishwasher/disposal, and granite counters.', 'Layout works well to create an area to work from home.', 'Then go up several steps to the large sunny loft bedroom open to the living area that leads to a newer renovated bath and a walk-in closet.', 'Professionally managed building.', 'Wonderful South Boston location, close to restaurants, shops, public transportation, and the beach.', 'Easy commute to Downtown Boston.', 'Common washer/dryers for the building are located on the same floor as the unit.', 'There is a small storage closet, and an area for bikes.', 'First MO/One MO Security/One MO Broker Fee due at lease signing.', 'Masks are required.', '$150 move in/move out fee to the management company.']
